Text:
Here they come. Lady Eta, get ready. Once they pass,
we'll set the pitfalls as planned.
Mmm...
To be honest, I wish we could drop the lot of them...
You mustn't, Lady Eta.

Lambda. You won't follow my lead, even if it's an
order?
This time...it's not a simple case of "Sir! Yes sir!"

I'm confident I can manipulate the slime...so that we
can rescue...just the possessed.

If the main objective is to destroy the Cult's
transport unit, I also believe the pitfall attack
would be effective.

However, regarding Lady Gamma's strategy to lure out
the Templars and attack them all at once, we can't
afford to eliminate all of the Cult's units yet!
Hmph...Gamma is on top of things for once.

She's usually the one that's better at messing things
up...
Um, Lady Eta, are you implying...

...you don't mind messing up the mission so long as
the possessed human is safely secured?

It says in Master's Shadow Wisdom..."All's well...
that ends well"!
I find it once again both reassuring and terrifying...

...to have a superior officer of such unbridled
genius as yourself!

Oh...they'll soon be passing the designated
position...
Alright...let's drop it.
Very well! Best of luck!
Heheh... Fall!
A-Aaaaah!!! The roaaaad—!!!
What—?! The hell is going on?!

The road we were just on...all of it suddenly
collapsed!

...Was it some sort of trap? Get me an update on
the rearguard!

...We've just confirmed there are no casualties!
All our members are safe!

But the path we were on has collapsed and vanished
without a trace!

The breach is vast and deep! It far exceeds the size
of a pothole! It's practically a massive pit!

We come up to a narrow ravine at the end of this
road. Could someone be cutting off our retreat?

But such an endeavor wouldn't be possible without
artifacts or explosives... That said, the pitfall was
far too well-crafted to have occurred naturally...

...We'll continue our advance with speed and caution!
Let's make haste through this ravine as swiftly as
possible!
That was a clean drop... Heh.

The slime mimics the ground, resulting in vast areas
collapsing upon its release...

It's as you say, Lady Eta. If we use this trap,
it would be possible to send large swaths of
people into the abyss!

Next time we try something like this...I'd like to
see how many people we can drop...
Lady Eta?

No need to wait for another opportunity... After all,
there's always...the training center at Alexandria...
Please! Anything but that!

...I'll give the signal! The unit waiting at the
cliff will use the falling rocks to separate the
escort convoy from the caged possessed!

For now, I'll start experimenting with how to mimic
the floor of the training center—

That'll be the end of us! Please, Lady Eta! If we
take it that far, there's no way Lady Alpha will
let us go with just a scolding!
...You're scared...Lambda.
But...I swear I'll do it someday!
Lady Eta?!
